main event: A witness reported seeing a luminous disc-shaped object hovering in Centerville, Idaho on 8-22-53.
interesting points: The object was approximately 50 feet in diameter and hovered for 10-15 minutes., It gave off a bright glow and ascended rapidly before disappearing., No other witnesses came forward or provided evidence., The Air Force was unable to identify the object., The incoming report was from a reliable observer.
